question: What milestone has been reached by India’s vaccination drive, as of March 15, 2021?
explanation:
India’s COVID 19 vaccination drive has reached an important milestone of administering 3 crore vaccinations to the public in a record time.
India has become one of the very few countries to achieve this fete. India commenced its vaccination drive on 16th January 2021 and this milestone has been achieved in a shortest possible time.
